thread.title: Watch: NHL ref Wes McCauley gets extra pumped about fighting call
thread.title_full: Watch: NHL ref Wes McCauley gets extra pumped about fighting call

author: Brandon Schlager (bschlager@sportingnews.com)
title: Watch: NHL ref Wes McCauley gets extra pumped about fighting call
text:
February 12, 2017 9:29pm EST February 12, 2017 9:29pm EST Ice Hockey, NHL, News, English, Boston Bruins, Montreal Canadiens No NHL official appreciates the art of building drama in a rivalry game quite like Wes McCauley. Wes McCauley (Getty Images) 
Updated at 9:29 p.m. ET 
Updated at 9:29 p.m. ET 
No NHL official appreciates the art of building drama in a rivalry game quite like Wes McCauley. 
On Sunday, Canadiens forward Andrew Shaw and Bruins defenseman Torey Krug set the tone with an inspired tussle 58 seconds into the game. McCauley, a veteran referee with 14 NHL years under his belt, was noticeably pumped while announcing the dual fighting majors, so he put his own twist on the call.
